text: The Secret of Us is the second studio album by American singer-songwriter Gracie Abrams, released on June 21, 2024, by Interscope Records. It was mostly produced by Abrams and American musician Aaron Dessner. Two singlesâ€”"Risk" and "Close to You" came out before the album's release. "I Love You, I'm Sorry" was released as the third single months later. It became Abrams' first song to reach the top-20 region of the United States' Billboard Hot 100. American singer-songwriter Taylor Swift, appears on the track "Us" as a featured guest. ==References== Category:2024 albums Category:Gracie Abrams albums
title: The Secret of Us
